verses.text: Oh that my head were waters , and mine eyes a fountain of tears , that I might weep day and night for the slain of the daughter of my people !\f + \fr 9.1 \ft Oh…: Heb. Who will give my head, etc\f*
Oh that I had in the wilderness a lodging place of wayfaring men ; that I might leave my people , and go from them! for they \add be\add* all adulterers , an assembly of treacherous men.

And they bend their tongues \add like\add* their bow \add for\add* lies : but they are not valiant for the truth upon the earth ; for they proceed from evil to evil , and they know not me, saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Take ye heed every one of his neighbour , and trust ye not in any brother : for every brother will utterly supplant , and every neighbour will walk with slanders.\f + \fr 9.4 \ft neighbour: or, friend\f*

And they will deceive every one his neighbour , and will not speak the truth : they have taught their tongue to speak lies , \add and\add* weary themselves to commit iniquity.\f + \fr 9.5 \ft deceive: or, mock\f*
Thine habitation \add is\add* in the midst of deceit ; through deceit they refuse to know me, saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
Therefore thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts , Behold, I will melt them, and try them; for how shall I do for the daughter of my people ?

Their tongue \add is as\add* an arrow shot out ; it speaketh deceit : \add one\add* speaketh peaceably to his neighbour with his mouth , but in heart he layeth his wait.\f + \fr 9.8 \ft in heart: Heb. in the midst of him\f*\f + \fr 9.8 \ft his wait: or, wait for him\f* \p
¶ Shall I not visit them for these \add things\add*? saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: shall not my soul be avenged on such a nation as this?

For the mountains will I take up a weeping and wailing , and for the habitations of the wilderness a lamentation , because they are burned up , so that none can pass through \add them;\add* neither can \add men\add* hear the voice of the cattle ; both the fowl of the heavens and the beast are fled ; they are gone.\f + \fr 9.10 \ft habitations: or, pastures\f*\f + \fr 9.10 \ft burned up: or, desolate\f*\f + \fr 9.10 \ft both…: Heb. from the fowl even to, etc\f*
And I will make Jerusalem heaps , \add and\add* a den of dragons ; and I will make the cities of Judah desolate , without an inhabitant.\f + \fr 9.11 \ft desolate: Heb. desolation\f* \p

¶ Who \add is\add* the wise man , that may understand this? and \add who is he\add* to whom the mouth of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath spoken , that he may declare it, for what the land perisheth \add and\add* is burned up like a wilderness , that none passeth through ?
And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* saith , Because they have forsaken my law which I set before them, and have not obeyed my voice , neither walked therein;
But have walked after the imagination of their own heart , and after Baalim , which their fathers taught them:\f + \fr 9.14 \ft imagination: or, stubbornness\f*

Therefore thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts , the God of Israel ; Behold, I will feed them, \add even\add* this people , with wormwood , and give them water of gall to drink.
I will scatter them also among the heathen , whom neither they nor their fathers have known : and I will send a sword after them, till I have consumed them. \p
¶ Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts , Consider ye, and call for the mourning women , that they may come ; and send for cunning \add women\add*, that they may come :
And let them make haste , and take up a wailing for us, that our eyes may run down with tears , and our eyelids gush out with waters.
For a voice of wailing is heard out of Zion , How are we spoiled ! we are greatly confounded , because we have forsaken the land , because our dwellings have cast \add us\add* out.
Yet hear the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, O ye women , and let your ear receive the word of his mouth , and teach your daughters wailing , and every one her neighbour lamentation.
For death is come up into our windows , \add and\add* is entered into our palaces , to cut off the children from without , \add and\add* the young men from the streets.

Speak , Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Even the carcases of men shall fall as dung upon the open field , and as the handful after the harvestman , and none shall gather \add them\add*. \p

¶ Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Let not the wise \add man\add* glory in his wisdom , neither let the mighty \add man\add* glory in his might , let not the rich \add man\add* glory in his riches :

But let him that glorieth glory in this, that he understandeth and knoweth me, that I \add am\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* which exercise lovingkindness , judgment , and righteousness , in the earth : for in these \add things\add* I delight , saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*. \p

¶ Behold, the days come , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that I will punish all \add them which are\add* circumcised with the uncircumcised ;\f + \fr 9.25 \ft punish: Heb. visit upon\f*

Egypt , and Judah , and Edom , and the children of Ammon , and Moab , and all \add that are\add* in the utmost corners , that dwell in the wilderness : for all \add these\add* nations \add are\add* uncircumcised , and all the house of Israel \add are\add* uncircumcised in the heart.\f + \fr 9.26 \ft in the utmost…: Heb. cut off into corners, or, having the corners of their hair polled\f*
